 Job Description
   

  


 En tant que responsable du développement des comptes, vous serez chargé de promouvoir et de vendre avec succès les solutions, produits et services hydrauliques industrielle de Bosch Rexroth sur un territoire défini. Les tâches et responsabilités comprennent ;
 


* Utiliser des techniques de vente à valeur ajoutée pour comprendre les activités de nos clients et proposer des solutions qui améliorent l'offre de nos clients, en veillant à ce que Bosch Rexroth soit un partenaire commercial privilégié.
* Vendre efficacement les produits et services de l'entreprise par des contacts planifiés et réguliers avec les clients et des visites sur le terrain.
* Proposer des solutions techniques aux clients, le cas échéant.
* Négocier des contrats et examiner les conditions commerciales conformément aux règles convenues en matière de remises et de marges.
* Préparer des devis et des spécifications détaillés en veillant à ce que les exigences du client soient satisfaites.
* Assurer la documentation en temps utile des données pertinentes en organisant et en maintenant l'interaction avec les clients dans le système de gestion de la relation client de la société, ROBIN. (par exemple, les coordonnées des clients, les informations sur l'entreprise, les rapports de visite, la gestion des opportunités, etc.) conformément aux attentes minimales d'utilisation.
* Produire et développer des rapports mensuels d'informations commerciales pour soutenir les contrôles du département et les améliorations des performances conformément aux normes de l'entreprise et aux exigences en matière de rapports.
* Collaborer régulièrement avec les autres membres de l'équipe, du département et de l'entreprise afin d'assurer un flux d'informations rapide et réciproque et de contribuer à un travail d'équipe efficace.
* Travailler à tous les niveaux avec les clients existants et potentiels afin de comprendre leurs activités et d'identifier leurs plans d'affaires futurs, en veillant à ce que Bosch Rexroth soit le meilleur partenaire possible pour répondre à leurs besoins futurs.
* Autres tâches en fonction des besoins



 As the Account Development Manager, you will be responsible for successfully promoting and value selling of Bosch Rexroth Industrial Hydraulic solutions, products and services into a defined territory. Duties and responsibilities include;
 


* Utilizing value\\-selling techniques to understand our customers’ businesses and offer solutions that both enhance and improve our customers’ offering, ensuring Bosch Rexroth is a preferred business partner.
* Effectively selling company products and services through planned and regular customer contact and field visits.
* Proposing technical system solutions to customers as required.
* Negotiating contracts and reviewing commercial terms and conditions in line with agreed discount and margin rules.
* Preparing detailed quotations and specifications ensuring customer requirements are fulfilled
* Ensuring timely documenting of relevant data by organizing and maintaining customer interaction within the companies CRM system, ROBIN. (e.g. customer contact details, company information, visit reporting, opportunity management etc.) in line with minimum expectations of use.
* Producing and developing business information monthly reports to support department controls and performance improvements in line with company standards and reporting requirements
* Collaborating regularly with other members of the team, department and business to ensure rapid two\\-way flow of information and contribution to effective teamwork.
* Working at all levels with existing and prospective customers to understand their business and identify their future business plans, ensuring Bosch Rexroth is the best possible partner to support their future needs.
* Other duties as assigned


 Qualifications
   

  


**Formation** 



* Ingénieur/Technologue en mécanique (ou équivalent).
* Un diplôme en commerce est un atout, mais n'est pas nécessaire.



**Expérience/compétences** 



* Le bilinguisme (français et anglais) est requis.
* Plus de 5 ans d'expérience en vente/marketing dans la promotion de produits connexes auprès de comptes industriels
* Solides connaissances techniques et aptitudes ; forte compréhension de l'industrie de l'hydraulique
* Forte compréhension de la vente à valeur ajoutée
* Solides compétences en matière de communication et d'écoute ; empathie à l'égard des besoins d'autrui ; compétences organisationnelles, y compris en matière de gestion de projets.
* Compétences informatiques suffisantes pour organiser les données et préparer les présentations.
* Professionnel de la vente certifié (ou équivalent)
* Compréhension financière des états et des indicateurs clés de performance et lien avec l'impact opérationnel (matrice à déterminer)
* Sens élevé de l'urgence et de l'orientation client
* Capacité à créer une vision et à fixer des objectifs
* Autonomie et dynamisme
* Esprit d'équipe, capacité à motiver les autres



**Education** 



* Mechanical Engineer/Technologist (or equivalent).
* Business degree is an asset, but not required



**Experience/skills** 



* Bilingual (French \\& English) is required
* 5\\+ years of sales/marketing experience in promoting related products to industrial accounts
* Strong technical background and aptitude; strong understanding of the hydraulics industry
* Strong understanding of value\\-added selling
* Strong, effective communication and listening skills; Empathic to the needs of others; organizational skills including project management
* Sufficient computer skills to organize data and prepare presentations
* Certified Sales Professional (or equivalent)
* Financial understanding of statements and KPIs and link to operational impact (matrix to be determined)
* High sense of urgency and customer focus
* Effective at creating vision and goal setting
* Self\\-starter and driver
* Team player, able to motivate others


  

  

 Additional Information
   

  


 Par choix, nous nous engageons envers une main\\-d'œuvre diversifiée et sommes un employeur garantissant l'égalité des chances. Bosch Rexroth accueille et encourage les candidatures de personnes handicapées. Des aménagements sont disponibles sur demande pour les candidats prenant part au processus de sélection.
 



 By choice, we are committed to a diverse workforce and are an equal opportunity employer. Bosch Rexroth welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in the selection process.

Job Title: Senior C++ Programmer - Machine Learning   Content Creation Technology Group
Job Description:
Job Description
   

  


 The Content Creation Technology Group (CCTG) is looking for a Senior AI/ML Programmer who will contribute to the development of applications in the domains of Generative AI and ML bots. The Senior AI/ML Programmer role will bring best practices and design principles to assist the team in delivering our ambitious features roadmap. 
 



  
 



**Main responsibilities:** 



* Provide and support ML systems based on business requirements and objectives.


* Establish technical designs to meet game’s needs.


* Collaborate with the data science team, specialized programmers (gameplay, AI, etc.), the research team, and other stakeholders such as productions.


* Develop, integrate, and maintain inference engines, libraries, and ML frameworks.


* Leverage best hardware (NPU, GPU, CPU) to accelerate ML related computations


* Develop systems that allow Gameplay programmers and Data scientist to easily track relevant data to train models


* Develop systems to benchmark, evaluate and optimize model’s performance


* Program in a clear and structured manner that is in keeping with performance, maintenance, modularity, scalability and compatibility requirements


* Integrate and maintain ML systems in game engines and games.


* Write unit tests and integration tests



  
 



**Other responsibilities:** 



* Creating proof of concepts, that can require model training, fine tuning, experimenting with different techniques and models.


* Suggest improvements whenever necessary by designing and implementing new systems or enhancing existing ones


* Conducting research to stay up to date with the latest advancements.


* Documentation, presentations, and knowledge sharing to communicate complex AI concepts to both technical and non\\-technical collaborators.


 Qualifications
   

  


**Education:** 




 Bachelor’s degree in computer science or computer engineering or equivalent. Master in Machine Learning is an asset. 
 



  
 



**Relevant Experience:** 




 Minimum 5 years’ experience in AI/ML. 
 



  
 



**Core Skills:** 



* In\\-depth knowledge of C\\+\\+ required


* Strong Architecture skills


* A good hardware knowledge, to take advantage of multithreading, and optimize memory management.



  
 



**Other Skills:** 



* Proficient in Python is an asset.


* Experience working with game engines is an asset.


* A good knowledge of Database products is an asset.


* A good knowledge of cloud\\-based platforms is an asset.


* A good knowledge of machine learning and deep learning fundamentals.

The Credit Risk Strategy Department develops and implements credit risk decision\\-making strategies based on risk/return quantification to deliver value for the organization as well as members and clients while safeguarding Desjardins Group's long\\-term survival. As a Credit Risk Data Scientist, you help meet needs associated to a credit risk assessment related to the granting and life cycle of financing products. You lead practitioners on projects that develop and use credit strategies for the institution's business activities. You serve as a specialist advisor, resource person and coach for the team and business partners. You'll be required to:
 


* Design, use and develop decision\\-making strategies for credit management and diligently prepare associated documentation.
* Build innovative algorithms to evolve our risk strategies.
* Support the transformation of credit risk strategies and maximize their financial impact.
* Balance business needs, risk management, requirements and best practices.
* Lead or contribute to projects, mandates or activities in your field of expertise.
* Serve as a specialist in your field of expertise for units in the organization and practitioners. Explain information in plain language and based on the target audience in order to facilitate comprehension and, if applicable, decision making.
* Monitor the industry to understand and anticipate trends in your field of expertise to develop and update relevant best practices for the organization.







**What we offer\\*** 



* Competitive salary and annual bonus
* 4 weeks of flexible vacation starting in the first year
* Defined benefit pension plan that provides predictable, stable income throughout retirement
* Group insurance including telemedicine
* Reimbursement of health and wellness expenses and telework equipment



*\\* Benefits apply based on eligibility criteria.* 








**What you bring to the table** 



* Bachelor's degree in math, statistics, economics, finance or a related field
* A minimum of six years of relevant experience
* Please note that other combinations of qualifications and relevant experience may be considered
* Machine learning experience: Knowledge of machine learning algorithms and their application in credit risk management
* Experience in credit risk management and quantification
* Knowledge of French is required
* Intermediate knowledge of English due to the nature of the duties or work tools or because the position involves interactions with English\\-speaking partners, members and/or clients
* Proficiency with SAS, SQL and Python programming tools


 Innovation

Job Title: Senior Technical Product Manager - Data & ML Platform
Job Description:
**Drive Coveo towards innovation and relevance!** 

 As a Senior Technical Product Manager for the Data \\& ML Platform, you'll play a critical role in shaping Coveo's data and machine learning infrastructure. Our AI\\-powered platform relies on cutting\\-edge data acquisition, processing, and storage architectures to deliver intelligent, real\\-time experiences to end\\-users. Your mission? Define a technology vision and roadmap to propel our platform into the future.
 



 If you're excited about enabling R\\&D teams to build the right solutions, collaborating across foundational R\\&D units, and equipping product teams with the data and ML capabilities they need to push our competitive edge—let's talk!
 


**Here's what makes this opportunity exciting:** 

 Coveo is a leader in AI\\-driven relevance, helping global enterprises optimize digital experiences. Our Data Platform ingests vast amounts of data, transforms it into actionable insights, and fuels our AI\\-powered solutions. In this role, you will drive innovation, scalability, and cost\\-effectiveness across our data and ML stack, impacting the entire organization.
 



 If you're passionate about bridging the gap between data, ML, and business impact, this is your chance to make a real difference!
 


**Here's what you'll be responsible for:** 
* Defining and driving the product roadmap for Coveo's Data \\& ML Platform, ensuring alignment with business goals and technical vision.
* Researching industry trends and customer needs to inform product decisions and prioritize impactful initiatives.
* Collaborating with internal stakeholders—engineering, product, and business teams—to provide reliable and scalable data solutions.
* Partnering with Product Marketing and Customer Success to effectively communicate data changes and mitigate customer impact.
* Advocating for data self\\-serve models and ML platform capabilities that empower teams across Coveo.


**Here's what will qualify you for the role:** 
* 5\\+ years of product management experience in a SaaS environment, with deep expertise in data ingestion pipelines, data platforms, cloud solutions (ideally AWS), and ML infrastructure.
* Familiarity with cloud\\-based data storage, transformation, and governance solutions such as Snowflake or Databricks.
* Strong analytical mindset, with the ability to define and measure success through data\\-driven metrics, and excellent communication skills, enabling alignment between technical and non\\-technical stakeholders.


**Here's what will make you stand out from the crowd:** 
* You thrive in a fast\\-paced, innovative environment and excel at translating technical challenges into strategic opportunities.
* You have hands\\-on experience with large\\-scale data processing, ML workflows, or AI\\-driven analytics.
* You're passionate about fostering collaboration between data teams, engineers, and business leaders.



 Do you think you can bring this role to life?
   

 You don't need to check every single box—passion goes a long way, and we appreciate that skillsets are transferable. We want to hear from you!
 



 Join the
 **Coveolife** 
 !
 



*We encourage all qualified candidates to apply, regardless of age, gender, disability, gaps in CV, or national or ethnic background. We know that applying for a new role takes time, and we truly appreciate your effort.*

 Nous recherchons un coequipier comme toi !

 Join an Agile and ambitious team that is driven to always improve and develop innovative applications within our platform that help broadcasters, podcasters and music services maximize their online revenue.

 Employment Type: Full\\-Time

 We're on the hunt for a
 **Senior Machine Learning Data Scientist** 
 to help us create smarter, more realistic AI bots for player simulations. Think: next\\-level gaming experiences powered by cutting\\-edge ML tech. You'll join a creative, data\\-loving team pushing the limits of what AI can do in gaming.

* Train \\& fine\\-tune ML models

 Bilingual? Even better (EN/FR).
 



 Ready to join a team shaping the future of AI in content creation?
 



  





**Apply now and let’s make magic happen.**

\\*english below\\*
 



  





**Qui sommes\\-nous ?** 




  





 Chef de file mondial de l’industrie de l’ingénierie et du conseil TI avec plus de 58 000 conseiller·e·s à travers le monde, le Groupe ALTEN optimise la performance technologique des entreprises depuis plus de 30 ans.
 



 Les personnes qui composent le groupe ALTEN constituent le moteur de notre activité. Chez ALTEN Canada, nous offrons à chaque candidat·e un service entièrement personnalisé. Vous avez la possibilité d’exercer votre métier de façon indépendante ou permanente. Nous sélectionnons les meilleures opportunités répondant à vos aspirations professionnelles. Nous positionnons votre savoir\\-faire sur des mandats passionnants à la hauteur de vos ambitions.
 



 ALTEN Canada c’est aussi un centre de solutions, le « Montreal Delivery Center (MDC) », qui propose des services managés dans les domaines du développement applicatif, de la pratique Données, IA \\& Analytiques Avancées et de la Cyber Sécurité pour les secteurs bancaires, télécoms et pour l’industrie au sens large.
 



 Nos expert·e·s sont sélectionné·e·s rigoureusement et assurent une proximité ainsi qu’un niveau de services et de compétences incomparable dans la région de Montréal.
 



  





**Quels profils recrutons\\-nous et pour qui ?** 




 Pour soutenir la croissance du MDC et d'Alten en Amérique du Nord, nous recrutons un.e responsable de pratique intelligence artificielle dont le rôle sera d'etre notre ambassadeur pour identifier les opportunités sur les Business Unit de Alten mais aussi côté client (avant vente, etc).
 



  





 Quelles seront mes missions principales ?
 


1. ***Évaluation des projets existants***
*pour identifier des opportunités d’infusion d’IA.*
2. ***Support technique aux activités pré\\-vente***
*, incluant l'analyse des appels d'offres et des besoins clients.*

*pour intégrer l’IA dans les réponses aux appels d’offres.*

*(Aérospatial, Énergie, Automobile, etc.).*
5. ***Classification et préparation du matériel marketing***
*pour les accélérateurs IA.*



  





**Quelles seront mes responsabilités ?** 



* *Analyser et soutenir les appels d’offres nécessitant des solutions IA.*
* *Collaborer avec les unités locales pour définir et exécuter des plans d’action IA.*
* *Fournir un support technique et stratégique aux équipes commerciales et de gestion de projet.*

**About Us:** 




 Ubicquia revolutionizes critical infrastructure, transforming it into intelligent systems that drive energy efficiency, bolster grid resilience, and streamline operations for utilities and municipalities. Harnessing the power of advanced analytics and AI, Ubicquia processes over 2 billion data points daily, providing insights to optimize the management of streetlights, distribution transformers, and utility poles. Its cutting\\-edge platforms—featuring sensors, software, and seamless connectivity—are deployed in more than 800 cities and integrated with top\\-tier manufacturers of streetlights, transformers, and public safety solutions. Ubicquia is headquartered in Florida. Discover more at www.ubicquia.com.
 



 Our products need to handle information at massive scale and extend well beyond basic IoT devices. We're looking for engineers and developers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information storage/retrieval, distributed computing, large\\-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, and artificial intelligence.
 



  





**Position Summary:** 




 As a Ubicquia employee, you will work on a specific project critical to the company’s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast\\-paced business grow and evolve. We need our developers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across technologies and disciplines as we continue to push technology forward.
 



  





 Ubicquia is looking for a Data Scientist, Utility Grid to work in the Data Team of our Customer Experience and Data Analytics department. This team member’s main tasks involve:
 



  




* Analyzing the data that is created by our electrical grid monitoring sensors to create value\\-added insights and notifications about the state of our utility partners’ electrical infrastructure. This is a Data as a Service (DaaS) initiative. The data scientist will perform time series analysis, anomaly detection, and analyze oscillography data, to identify root causes and descriptions of power quality events occurring on the electrical grid. The eventual goal is to detect these in real\\-time and match them to appropriate responses from utility partners.
* Analyzing cause codes and the output of grid monitoring sensors to predict equipment malfunction, failure and maintenance events before they happen. Proper validation and statistical tests will be required to ensure high precision and recall of any predictive analytic.
* The data scientist will use utility knowledge of events that affect electrical grid assets and transform these into signatures that identify events in our data. Proper evaluation methods will be used to monitor performance and identify areas of improvement. Python scripts that find these signatures and productionizing them to be included in our
 *Analytics Engine* 
 to generate events and reports on a cadence will also be expected.
* Performing reliability analysis for new field deployments of a particular sensor or existing deployments under new conditions. The data scientist will analyze when and how reliability issues occur and build visualization tools in the form of control charts and reliability graphs on Grafana to monitor ongoing deployments.



  





**Responsibilities:** 



* Understand business problems and uncover value using data mining techniques
* Engage with subject matter experts to prioritize and orient data analysis
* Own machine learning algorithm creation from data cleaning all the way to maintenance of models in production
* Perform root\\-cause analysis using data about failures in the field
* Design experiments to create statistically significant information on business problems
* Create visualizations to communicate findings effectively internally and externally



  





**Qualifications:** 



* BSc (MSc preferred) in Statistics, Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or equivalent
* Minimum of 5 years of experience with Python and data science libraries like Numpy, Pandas, Scipy
* Experience solving real\\-world utility problems using data analysis
* Extensive experience with statistical testing of claims, data science frameworks, machine learning algorithms
* Deep understanding of power grid analysis, oscillography analysis, and machine learning applications related to the electrical grid
* Experience working with databases (SQL) and cloud computing resources (AWS)
* Experience with development best practices like version control, documentation, and unit testing
* Experience working independently and presenting results to both management and technical audiences
* Excellent oral and written communication skills
* Collaborative and positive attitude



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 



* Reliability testing certifications
* Interest in IoT devices
* Database design experience

* Travailler en étroite collaboration avec les architectes d’entreprise sectorielle et au besoin avec les architectes de solutions de l’organisation afin de les soutenir dans leurs activités d’architecture.
* Garantir la pérennité, l’évolution et la cohérence globales des solutions mises de l’avant en tenant compte des cibles stratégiques, des exigences et des tendances du marché.
* Les domaines d’expertises sous votre responsabilité seront notamment :
* Les données et l’architecture des bases de données

Job Title: Sr. ML Platform Engineer / Développeur.se principal.e de plateforme ML
Job Description:
**About Reliant** 




 We believe that making the best decisions means looking at all the facts – a near\\-impossible task in our era of information overload. To fix this, we are building the next generation of machine learning software. Powered by generative AI, our algorithms analyze key information sources and provide comprehensive, factual answers for even your most complex queries.
 



 We believe that the transformative impact of generative AI will be only realized by those willing to take on the world’s biggest information challenges. To make this future come true, we deploy our longstanding expertise in reinforcement learning and natural language processing.
 



 We are scientists. Builders. Entrepreneurs. We spearheaded many of AI’s most impactful applications. We led teams at Google, DeepMind, and EY Parthenon. We now bridge cutting\\-edge AI research and the biopharma industry.
 







**About the role** 




 We are looking for a senior platform engineer with a strong track record working on applied ML (bonus points: in the life sciences). You will play a central role in defining and building out our ML and Data platform facilitating cutting\\-edge AI agents that excel at finding and organizing knowledge, and through your work lay the foundations of a new way of working with data.
 







 If you are passionate about applying AI to real problems, enjoy working in a fast\\-paced environment, and are excited about contributing to the growth of an ambitious startup, this opportunity is for you.
 







 As a key member of the machine learning team, you will
 


* Work closely with the product and commercial teams to define AI\\-human collaborative workflows for the life sciences
* Design and implement tooling and processes and tooling to benchmark against life sciences specific use cases that enable us to make rapid progress on key AI features
* Design and implement tooling and processes allowing us to understand model performance in production
* Design language model\\-powered data pipelines that scale to millions of documents
* Optimize the performance of our data and LLM infrastructure
* Train AI models specialized to specific information extraction and structuring work, optimizing for both accuracy, confidence, and performance
* Build tooling around our ML and Data platform to facilitate an ergonomic developer experience.
* Develop production\\-grade machine learning software



**About you** 




 As the ideal candidate, you have deep experience contributing to transformative machine learning applications. You are able to work end\\-to\\-end on machine learning applications and have an appreciation for automation, resiliency and proper tooling. You are a strong backend engineer with ample experience and interest in ML and Dev Ops.
 







 You will thrive in this role if you bring the following skills and experiences:
 


* A Master’s degree in Computer Science or related field (or equivalent experience), bonus if you have NLP or Reinforcement learning experience.


* Demonstrated experience implementing practical ML algorithms and scaling them up to large\\-scale datasets
* A strong ability to think creatively in a startup environment
* Experience with CI/CD and Infrastructure as Code
* 5\\+ years of experience developing in Python
* Demonstrated experience with Pytorch, Jax, Tensorflow, or a similar framework
* Excellent programming skills and ability to understand and design complex systems
* Bonus: Experience applying AI to the life sciences or adjacent field







 All qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, or national origin.
 



  

  





**Développeur.se principal.e de plateforme ML** 




**Description du poste** 




 Nous sommes à la recherche d’un.e ingénieur.e de plateforme spécialiste de l’apprentissage automatique (ML) appliqué (en sciences biologiques, un atout). Vous jouerez un rôle important dans l’élaboration et la conception de notre plateforme de ML et de données, alimentée par des agents d’IA de pointe maîtrisant l’art de trouver et de classer les connaissances. Votre travail servira à créer une nouvelle façon de tirer parti des données.
 







 Vous aimez vous servir de l’IA pour résoudre des problèmes concrets? Vous prospérez dans les environnements dynamiques et avez envie de contribuer à la croissance d’une entreprise en démarrage ambitieuse? Alors, ce poste est pour vous!
 







 En tant que membre clé de l’équipe ML, vous :
 


* Travaillerez en étroite collaboration avec les équipes de produits et commerciales pour établir des flux de travail alliant la puissance de l’IA et de l’humain pour les sciences biologiques;
* Créerez et mettrez en œuvre des outils et des processus à utiliser dans des cas d’usage précis dans le domaine des sciences biologiques pour favoriser le développement rapide des fonctions d’IA clés;
* Concevrez et implanterez des outils et des processus pour nous aider à mesurer la performance du modèle en production;
* Élaborerez des pipelines de données alimentés par des modèles de langage qui s’appliqueront à des millions de documents;
* Optimiserez la performance de notre infrastructure de données et de grands modèles de langage (LLMs);
* Entraînerez des modèles d’IA spécialisés dans l’extraction et la structuration de renseignements spécifiques afin d’optimiser leur précision, leur fiabilité et leur performance;
* Élaborerez des outils pour notre plateforme d’apprentissage automatique et de données qui simplifieront l’expérience de développement;
* Concevrez des logiciels d’apprentissage automatique de qualité production.







**Profil recherché** 




 Vous détenez une solide expérience de travail avec les applications d’apprentissage automatique transformatrices. Développeur.se backend chevronné.e, vous êtes en mesure de travailler de bout en bout sur des applications d’apprentissage automatique. L’automatisation, la résilience, les outils, l’apprentissage automatique ainsi que le développement et l’exploitation vous passionnent.
 



 Ce poste vous convient si vous avez les qualifications suivantes :
 


* Maîtrise en informatique ou dans un domaine connexe (ou expérience équivalente), et expérience en traitement automatique du langage naturel (NLP) ou en apprentissage par renforcement (RL), un atout;
* Solide expérience dans la mise en œuvre d’algorithmes d’apprentissage automatique pratiques et dans leur développement pour des ensembles de données importants;
* Grande capacité à faire preuve de créativité dans une entreprise en démarrage;
* Expérience en intégration et en déploiement continus, ainsi qu’en infrastructure en tant que code;
* Au moins 5 ans d’expérience en développement en Python;
* Solide expérience avec Pytorch, Jax, Tensorflow ou tout autre cadre d’applications similaire;
* Solides compétences en programmation et capacité à comprendre et à concevoir des systèmes complexes;
* Expérience en application de l’IA aux sciences biologiques ou à un domaine connexe, un atout.







 Toute candidature de personne qualifiée sera examinée, peu importe sa race, son origine ethnique, sa religion, son sexe, son identité de genre et son orientation sexuelle.

Company Name: Caisse de depot et placement du Quebec
Job Description:
**Become invested in the community!** 








 Join the CDPQ team and take pride in contributing to the financial future of millions of Quebecers by creating a more sustainable world.
 







 At CDPQ:
 


* We value your unique contribution to a world\\-class team.
* We give you work that allows you to flourish and excel.
* We offer opportunities to learn from experts who generously share their knowledge.
* We are fully invested so that you can fulfil our mission every day.












 Au sein de l'equipe Gestion des risques et relevant du Directeur principal \\- Risque d'investissement, developpement quantitatif et systemes, la personne titulaire du poste travaillera en etroite collaboration avec l'expert\\-modele de l'equipe des Risques d'investissement et occupera un role cle dans les activites de modelisation quantitatives de la CDPQ. Elle aura comme objectif de valider et revoir les modeles quantitatifs touchant toutes les classes d'actifs, autant des equipes d'investissement que des equipes d'analyse et de pilotage du portefeuille (construction de portefeuille, science de donnees, devises, relations avec les deposants). Elle sera amenee a collaborer etroitement sur les projets de modelisation de l'equipe des risques et contribuer activement a la culture quantitative de l'equipe.
 







**Ce que vous ferez** 



* Effectuer la validation de modeles dans le but de garantir que l'organisation adhere aux meilleures pratiques en termes de traitement de donnees, modelisation, et robustesse de modeles;
* Recommander des ameliorations aux modeles afin d'influencer proactivement les decisions d'investissement et suivre le risque de modele de certaines activites critiques pour la CDPQ;
* Contribuer a l'execution du cadre de gestion du risque de modele rehausse a la CDPQ;
* Collaborer sur divers projets de modelisation et etreun acteur important pour l'innovation quantitative a l'interieur de l'equipe des risques ; mettre a profit et parfaire une expertise sur une grande diversite de modeles (apprentissage machine et intelligence artificielle) et de classes d'actifs (revenus fixes, actions, produits derives, trading algorithmique, actifs moins liquides, devises);







**Ce que vous etes** 




 Vous vous distinguez par votre :
 


* Esprit d'analyse et rigueur
* Habiletes relationnelles et de communication
* Ouverture d'esprit et curiosite
* Collaboration
* Imputabilite
* Leadership et ambition







**Ce que vous apportez** 



* Un minimum de sept (7\\) ans d'experience en gestion du risque, en investissement ou tout autre role quantitatif en finance;
* Diplome universitaire de deuxieme (2e) ou troisieme (3e) cycleen ingenierie financiere, finance, mathematiques ou tout autre domaine quantitatif; une combinaison equivalente de scolarite et d'experience pourra etre prise en consideration;
* Excellente connaissance des concepts statistiques et de mathematiques financieres;
* Connaissance solide des methodes d'apprentissage machine (Machine Learning);
* Habiletes en programmation (Python, Matlab, SQL, etc.);
* Maitrise du francais tant a l'oral qu'a l'ecrit; l'anglais\\* est un atout.



*\\*Interactions frequentes en anglais a l'oral et a l'ecrit avec des employes CDPQ bases dans un de nos 9 bureaux a l'international.* 












 \\#LI\\-DNI
 







 Feeling that my role is important. Having fun every day. Growing in step with my ambitions. Earning compensation that reflects my contribution. That's the professional experience CDPQ offers!
 











**We carefully review each application and directly contact those selected for an interview.** 








 CDPQ offers equal employment opportunities to everyone. Women, visible/ethnic minorities, Indigenous people and individuals with disabilities are all encouraged to apply. If you're interested in this job and even if your application does not meet all the criteria, do not hesitate to apply or contact us!
 







 CDPQ is also committed to promoting equity, diversity and inclusion as key values and sees them as a source of enrichment and pride for all its employees. Please let us know if you require adopted measures for the recruiting process.
 







 CDPQ represents la Caisse de depot et placement du Quebec and its subsidiaries.

**Software Developer Operations Research
   

 Montreal, QC Canada** 





 IBS is a leading global provider of new generation IT solutions to the Travel, Transportation and Logistics industries. A specialist in the domain, IBS offers a range of products and services that manage mission critical operations of airlines, airports, cruise lines, hospitality partners, tour operators and oil \\& gas companies that help them increase safety, maximize efficiency, improve revenue, manage growth and reduce costs.
 



 The Software Developer will join the Montreal IBS Software Canada Team located in Montreal, IBS' new center of excellence for optimization. This team focuses on developing a suite of customized  crew planning and optimization solutions that balance airline interests with those of planners and crew members.
 



**Job Summary** 




 The Software Developer is responsible for participating in the design of new optimization software products and existing product enhancements. This position reports to the development manager of products and will work closely with the R\\&D team and customers to deliver mission\\-critical software components. The ideal candidate will possess a variety of skills required for solving large\\-scale combinatorial optimization problems, including strong algorithmic thinking, complexity analysis, data structures and ability to analyze large datasets.
 



 This is a very hands\\-on position where the ideal candidate will not only drive the adoption of new architectures, but also work side\\-by\\-side with fellow developers to implement new product features and ensure high\\-quality development practices. He/she must respect project deadlines and ensure software quality meets the company's standards. Excellent communication skills are required, as the position requires close collaboration with fellow developers, Product Managers, architects, and customers.
 



 At IBS, OR developers are challenged with large\\-scale complex optimization problems that require special care about correctness, run times and memory usage. Creativity and modeling skills are key assets that we put to the proof!
 



  
 
**Major Tasks** 

* Participates in the design and analysis of solver\\-related software components.
* Programs and performs debugging, inspection, corrections, unit and integration testing, etc.
* Questions methods in place if need be, analyses algorithmic bottlenecks and flaws, and provides improvement directions.
* Participates in the writing of technical documents (functional specifications, design documents, etc.).
* Estimates required time\\-frame and resource requirements for accomplishing development tasks in projects.
* Provides technical support to both clients and employees.
* Works with customer\\-facing teams to understand customer needs and validate feasibility of product commitments.
* Other related duties as may be assigned.



**Qualifications** 



* B.Sc. (M.Sc. or Ph.D. is an asset) in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Operations Research, or another related field.
* At least 3 years of experience in software development.
* Experience with C programming or another related low\\-level programming language.
* Experience with the POSIX operating system and shell/Perl/Python scripting.
* Asset: familiar with version control concepts.
* Team oriented, results oriented, with strong customer focus.


* Excellent communication skills in French and English, both written and spoken.



**At IBS Software, you can look forward to:** 



* Gaining deep domain expertise in the (TTL) Travel, Transportation \\& Logistics domain.
* Working with the latest technologies \\& cutting edge tools to redefine the travel sector.
* Enjoying the many benefits of a stable SaaS based product company.
* Partnering with some of the biggest airlines, busiest airports, top tour \\& cruise providers, well known hotel chains, and large energy companies to augment their mission\\-critical operations.
* A diverse, global work culture with some of the brightest minds in the industry.
* A competitive benefits package, flexible work life policies, transparent rewards and recognitions, continuous learning and development, medical benefits, and fun@work policies.



**Equal Employment Opportunity Statement** 




 IBS Software is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veteran's status or any other characteristic protected by law.

About the team you are joining
 
 GlobalAviation Data Management (GADM) team is responsible for the development,implementation and support of data solutions needed to monitor safety,operational and capacity KPIs. These includes, without being limited to:
 


* Managing Data Sharing Programs (IDX, FDX, MCX and ADX).
* Supporting OSS lines of business in their data, analysis, reporting, and dashboard needs.
* Ensuring the availability, reliability, and quality of the data through performance tuning and continuous monitoring.
* Identifying and driving process improvement opportunities to optimize performance of data warehouse.
* Adhering to data governance policies, quality standards and best practices.


 What your day would be like
 
 Reporting to the Head of Data Insights \\& Advanced Analytics, you will be responsiblefor the application of complex data science techniques toward the collection,analysis, transformation, and modelling of aviation data for a variety of dataprojects. This role is also involved in analyzing data from Flight DataExchange, Incident Data Exchange, and Maintenance Cost Exchange programs.Identify patterns, detect anomalies, and prepare different types ofrecommendation and forecasting models.
 


* Weexpect you to create and maintain optimal data pipeline, including algorithmsand prototypes, so you can interpret trends and patterns and prepare data forprescriptive and predictive data modeling.
* Youwill build analytical tools that utilize the data pipeline, transform, and loadnew data sets, to provide actionable insights while maintaining the data secureand accessible.
* Youmay code new programs for ad hoc reports, custom products, and new productionjobs while maintaining, improving, and executing existing Python/PySpark modelsand SQL and/or no SQL scripts.
* Analyzelarge\\-scale structured and unstructured data; develop deep\\-dive analysis andmachine learning models to drive member value and customer success
* Supportteam members in interpreting collected data and categorizing findings.
* Apply advanced statisticalmethods such as regression analysis, clustering, factor analysis, time seriesanalysis, and machine learning algorithms. Develop Generative AI and NLP modelsto uncover patterns and correlations within complex textual datasets. Obtaintopics, perform taxonomy matching, and conduct text classification based ontext categories.

**Position Overview** 




 Looking for an opportunity to use your skills and abilities to influence the strategic direction of a major software company? The Research Engineering team of Autodesk Research is hiring a Principal Data Scientist. As a member of the Research Engineering team, you'll prototype software solutions for strategic research projects, demonstrating innovations for Autodesk products.
 







 You'll collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of scientists, engineers, and domain experts in manufacturing, robotics, architecture, computer vision, machine learning, and generative design. You will apply your data science knowledge and experience in the development of new, applications and systems. You'll advise others to help Autodesk Research as a whole make good decisions related to data science.
 



 You'll play a key role shepherding "what\\-if" ideas into tangible proof of concept demonstrations and prototypes. When you identify common data science requirements within Autodesk Research, you'll help plan and implement solutions to meet them.
 



 Autodesk Research is a hotbed of rapidly evolving projects, experimenting with cutting edge technologies. We deliver solutions with real\\-world benefits for our customers and society. Research Engineering is a supportive, international team of experienced developers, engineers, UX designers and QA specialists.
 







**Responsibilities** 



* Find ways to turn Autodesk data and Autodesk customer data into actionable insight
* Collaborate with the engineering team and other scientists, creating data pipelines to gather various types of data from a variety of systems and extract value
* Use analytical, statistical, and machine learning techniques to identify patterns and trends in data to uncover insights
* Recommend and develop algorithms to extract value from data in customer use cases
* Work with the engineering team to productize the performance metrics and predictive analytics to unlock high value outcomes for our customers







**Minimum Qualifications** 



* Bachelor's in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering or other quantitative discipline
* 7\\+ years of experience working in a global, high technology company
* Familiarity with statistical and machine learning techniques including hypothesis testing, experimental design, classification, regression, dimension reduction, regularization, clustering, and multivariate methods
* Experience with data modeling techniques, data ontologies, and defining normalized data models that can be used to produce analytical outcomes
* Proficiency with data analysis and experience with modern data science toolkits
* Ability to quickly learn new tools and technologies and apply them appropriately with a high level of quality
* Excellent written, visual, and oral communication skills. Able to explain complex topics to both technical and non\\-technical audiences







**Preferred Qualifications** 



* Experience with a variety of types of data from a variety of sources
* Adaptable and comfortable with complexity and uncertainty
* Self\\-motivated, creative, and collaborative
* Experience implementing and deploying data science models or data products
* Experience developing proof\\-of\\-concept and prototype solutions to problems
* Experience working in AWS or Azure environments and applying their compute and data analytics services
* Apache Spark, Pandas, Scikit\\-learn, PyTorch, TensorFlow, MLFlow, AWS Sagemaker, R, Matlab, Jupyter, Tableau
* Masters degree or PhD in a data science discipline
* Experience with data visualization tools
* Passionate about insights, not just data

**Description du poste** 




 Vous recherchez une opportunite d'utiliser vos competences et vos capacites pour influencer l'orientation strategique d'un grand editeur de logiciels ? L'equipe d'ingenierie de recherche d'Autodesk Research recrute un scientifique de donnees principal. En tant que membre de l'equipe d'ingenierie de recherche, vous protegerez des solutions logicielles pour des projets de recherche strategiques, demontrant des innovations pour les produits Autodesk.
   





 Vous collaborerez avec une equipe multidisciplinaire de scientifiques, d'ingenieurs et d'experts dans les domaines de la fabrication, de la robotique, de l'architecture, de la vision par ordinateur, de l'apprentissage automatique et de la conception generative. Vous appliquerez vos connaissances et votre experience en science des donnees au developpement de nouvelles applications et de nouveaux systemes. Vous conseillerez les autres afin d'aider Autodesk Research dans son ensemble a prendre de bonnes decisions en matiere de science des donnees.
 



 Vous jouerez un role cle en transformant les idees de type what\\-if en demonstrations et prototypes tangibles de type proof of concept . Lorsque vous identifierez les exigences communes en matiere de science des donnees au sein d'Autodesk Research, vous aiderez a planifier et a mettre en uvre des solutions pour y repondre.
 



 Autodesk Research est un foyer de projets en evolution rapide, experimentant des technologies de pointe. Nous proposons des solutions qui apportent des avantages concrets a nos clients et a la societe. L'ingenierie de recherche est une equipe internationale de soutien composee de developpeurs, d'ingenieurs, de concepteurs UX et de specialistes de l'assurance qualite experimentes.
   





**Responsabilites** 



* Trouver des moyens de transformer les donnees d'Autodesk et les donnees des clients d'Autodesk en informations exploitables
* Collaborer avec l'equipe d'ingenierie et d'autres scientifiques, creer des pipelines de donnees pour recueillir divers types de donnees a partir d'une variete de systemes et en extraire la valeur
* Utiliser des techniques analytiques, statistiques et d'apprentissage automatique pour identifier des modeles et des tendances dans les donnees afin de decouvrir des idees
* Recommander et developper des algorithmes pour extraire de la valeur des donnees dans les cas d'utilisation des clients
* Travailler avec l'equipe d'ingenierie pour produire les mesures de performance et les analyses predictives afin de debloquer des resultats a forte valeur ajoutee pour nos clients







**Qualifications minimales** 



* Licence en informatique, science des donnees, ingenierie ou autre discipline quantitative
* 7\\+ ans d'experience dans une entreprise internationale de haute technologie
* Familiarite avec les techniques statistiques et d'apprentissage automatique, y compris les tests d'hypothese, la conception experimentale, la classification, la regression, la reduction des dimensions, la regularisation, le regroupement et les methodes multivariees
* Experience des techniques de modelisation des donnees, des ontologies de donnees et de la definition de modeles de donnees normalises pouvant etre utilises pour produire des resultats analytiques
* Maitrise de l'analyse des donnees et experience des outils modernes de science des donnees
* Capacite a apprendre rapidement de nouveaux outils et de nouvelles technologies et a les appliquer de maniere appropriee avec un niveau de qualite eleve
* Excellentes competences en communication ecrite, visuelle et orale. Capacite a expliquer des sujets complexes a des publics techniques et non techniques







**Qualifications preferees** 



* Experience avec une variete de types de donnees provenant de diverses sources
* Capacite d'adaptation et aisance face a la complexite et a l'incertitude
* Motivation, creativite et esprit de collaboration
* Experience de la mise en uvre et du deploiement de modeles de science des donnees ou de produits de donnees
* Experience dans le developpement de preuves de concept et de prototypes de solutions a des problemes
* Experience du travail dans des environnements AWS ou Azure et de l'application de leurs services de calcul et d'analyse de donnees
* Apache Spark, Pandas, Scikit\\-learn, PyTorch, TensorFlow, MLFlow, AWS Sagemaker, R, Matlab, Jupyter, Tableau
* Maitrise ou doctorat dans une discipline de la science des donnees
* Experience avec des outils de visualisation de donnees
* Passionne par les idees, pas seulement par les donnees











 At Autodesk, we're building a diverse workplace and an inclusive culture to give more people the chance to imagine, design, and make a better world. Job Title: Work Equipment Heavy Duty Mechanic (Mechanic A)
Job Description:
Diesel Engine Mechanic (HDM)
 
 At CN, we are committed to our pursuit of excellence. We take pride in delivering work of the highest standard, continually innovating to shape the railroad of the future. As responsible railroaders, we make the right decisions every time, putting safety first, acting with unwavering integrity, and holding ourselves accountable for our actions. We believe in succeeding together\\-by fostering inclusivity and collaboration, we sustainably deliver exceptional results for our customers.
 



 If you are a skilled trades person or interested in skilled trades and continuous learning in a safety\\-focused environment, working at CN could be a great fit for you. You'll be working on all types of equipment and structures designed to support the distribution of freight across North America. Enjoy paid training and evolve your skills. The careers we offer are meaningful because the work we do matters. Join us and get your career moving!   
 


   Job Summary
 
 The Heavy\\-Duty Mechanic (HDM) is responsible for performing inspections, major and minor repairs, overhauls and servicing on all types of locomotives.
 



  
 


 Working Conditions
 
          Ability to work irregular shifts, including nights, weekends, holidays, and occasional overtime.
 


* Shop environment.
* Occasional travel.



  
 


 Major Responsibilities
 
          Heavy Duty Mechanics (HDM) perform major and minor repairs, overhauls and servicing on all types of locomotives. To learn more about the job click here to view the video.
 



  
 



          Critical performance areas include the following but may vary depending on the location and circumstances:
 



  
 



          Inspect, service and maintain locomotives, in accordance with federal and company regulations, including changing oil or repairing, replacing, cleaning and adjusting parts.
   

  





          Diagnose diesel engine malfunctions and making required repairs.
 



  
 



          Assemble and start engines.
 



  
 



          Use electric and oxy\\-acetylene welding equipment, lubrication equipment and other vehicle repair tools and equipment, and operate said tools and machinery in a safe and effective manner.
 



  
 



          Prepare inspection, maintenance, and work reports, and record details on prescribed forms in accordance with established procedures.
 



  
 



          Operate locomotive on shop tracks.
 



  
 



          Test locomotives on shop track after repair.
 


   Requirements
 
          High School Diploma or General Educational Development (GED)
 


* Diesel mechanic experience and/or Diesel mechanic diploma.
* A valid driver's license.
* Using measuring devices and understanding visual displays.
* Basic technical knowledge of diesel mechanics.
* Good hand\\-eye coordination.
* Dedicated to getting the job done while meeting established standards of quality, safety, and client satisfaction.
* Frequent lifting / carrying up to 50 lbs. (22 kg).







 Assets
 
          Valid commercial driver's license for the class and type of equipment operated
 


* Ability to certify company equipment in accordance with provincial standards



          Experience troubleshooting hydraulic and electronic systems
 



  
 



          Welding skills
 


   What We Offer
 * Competitive Wages, Benefits, and Pension Plan
* Paid Training and Career Development
* Medical, vision, and dental insurance
* 24/7 Telemedicine Service
* Employee Share Investment Plan
* Educational Financial Assistance Program
* Employee Resource Groups (ERGs)
* Extensive Employee Discount Program
* Employee \\& Family Assistance Program (EFAP)








*This position is a unionized position, as such pay and benefits are governed by the applicable Collective Agreement.* 



   Paid Training:
 
 Successful candidates will receive on\\-the\\-job training, both theoretical and practical instructions. Depending on your level of experience, candidates may receive a 4\\-year on\\-the\\-job apprenticeship program and will attend a series of courses at your work location in Canada.
 



 Training will include locomotive components, locomotive control systems, locomotive air brakes, locomotive start up, basic diesel electric systems and CN maintenance regulations. Truck and traction motors, event recorders, as well as fuel, oil, water and air systems plus power assembly will also be covered. Successful completion of this program is essential for performance of future duties.
 



  
 



**Successful Candidate Process:** 



* Medical assessment (including drug, hearing, and vision).
* Criminal background check
* Offer Letter



  
 



**Paid Training Structure:** 



* 3 weeks at CN campus
* 2\\+ weeks in shop (on\\-the\\-job training)
* 3 weeks at CN campus



  
 


 About CN
 
 CN is a premium railroad that sustainably generates value for our customers, shareholders, employees, and stakeholders with an unwavering commitment to safety and service. Essential to the economy, to the customers, and to the communities it serves, CN safely transports more than 300 million tons of natural resources, manufactured products, and finished goods throughout North America every year. CN's network connects Canada's Eastern and Western coasts with the U.S. South through an 18,800\\-mile rail network. CN and its affiliates have been contributing to community prosperity and sustainable trade since 1919\\. CN powers the North American economy and is committed to programs supporting social responsibility and environmental stewardship.
 



*At CN, we are dedicated to building North America's
 **safest** 
 , most
 **inclusive,** 
 and
 **sustainable** 
 railroad, which includes reflecting the communities in which we operate. Research shows that candidates from underrepresented groups often don't apply unless they feel they fit the job posting at 100%. Even if you don't see yourself in every job requirement listed in a posting, we still encourage you to apply. If you require an accommodation for the recruitment process (including alternate formats of materials, accessible meeting rooms or other accommodations), please get in touch with our team at
 **cnrecruitment@cn.ca** 
 .* 




*As an equal employment opportunity employer, qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, and other protected status as required by applicable law.*

As an organization at the forefront of autonomous driving, we have gathered vast amounts of valuable sensor data that provide a deep insight into various driving environments and scenarios. Within the AI Foundation Department our strategic response is to integrate foundational machine learning techniques to harness its full potential and drive its capabilities further ahead to adhere to future needs.
 



 Therefore, we are searching for a Deep Learning Specialist with Reinforcement Learning or Control Background deploying our next\\-generation modular and differentiable AV stack, bridging the gap between traditional model\\-based modularity and modern deep learning practices.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 
 :
 


* Design and deployment of our innovative modular and differentiable AV stack, focusing on prediction, planning, and control.
* Collaborate closely with our research and development teams, ensuring the seamless incorporation of model\\-based planning and control algorithms with advancements in differentiable optimization.
* Drive the continuous enhancement of our AV architectures, championing the harmony between modularity and end\\-to\\-end neural networks.
* Spearhead the evaluation process of our AV stack, ensuring marked improvements in both open\\-loop and closed\\-loop planning metrics.
* Advocate for and ensure the interpretability, reusability, and efficiency of our AV solutions, while maximizing the capabilities of deep learning and differentiable optimization.
* Stay abreast of the latest developments in differentiable optimization, ensuring our AV stack remains at the forefront of innovation.



**Qualifications** 
 :
 


* MS, or PhD in Machine Learning, Computer Science, Robotics, or related fields with at least the years working experience or equivalent.
* Comprehensive understanding of modular AV system components combined with proficiency in end\\-to\\-end neural network designs.
* Hands\\-on experience with differentiable optimization and its applications in deep learning models.
* Demonstrable history of deploying neural network architectures for practical applications, with a preference for those within the autonomous vehicles domain.
* Expertise in Python and familiarity with major deep learning frameworks like PyTorch or TensorFlow.
* Exceptional analytical and problem\\-solving acumen, particularly in optimizing system performance and mitigating integration challenges.



**Bonus Points** 
 !
 


* Scholarly publications related to differentiable optimization, neural network architectures, or autonomous vehicle systems in high tier conferences as CVPR, ICCV, ICRA, IROS, NeurIPS ...
* Prior experience in developing or collaborating on AV stacks, especially in prediction, planning, and control sectors.
* Knowledge of contemporary strategies for testing and deploying deep learning models in real\\-world settings.

**:** 




***Department Overview***




 TD Model Validation (MV) group is responsible for the independent validation and approval of analytical models used for credit, fraud/AML (anti\\-money laundering), NLP, pricing, hedging, insurance, capital evaluations, and marketing. The Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML) MV team is responsible for the validation of all AI/ML models used across the Bank for various use cases.
 







***Job Description***








 The position reports to Senior Applied Machine Learning Scientist in the AI/ML Model Validation team. Detailed accountabilities include:
 


* Validate (review, test, and provide effective challenge) AI/ML models.
* Stay up to date with advancements in the field of AI/ML including major publications, evaluation metrics, technology stacks, and libraries.
* Maintain full professional knowledge of techniques and developments in the field of AI/ML and share knowledge with business partners and senior management.
* Develop/implement AI/ML model validation methodologies and standards. Ensure that the validation methodologies and standards are in line with industry best practices or address regulatory and audit requirements.
* Develop and apply a variety of statistical tests and modeling techniques to identify/recommend improvements to models and undertake related initiatives. Implement benchmark models as applicable.
* Communicate findings and recommendations to both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders.







 The position involves working effectively with different internal partners suchas AI2, FCRM, RMD, P\\&Tetc.
 







***Job Requirements***







* Strong quantitative skills with an advanced degree in one or more of the following areas: computer science, engineering, machine learning, statistics, mathematics, physics, or actuarial science.
* Proven experience as a Machine Leaning Scientist, Data Scientist or a similar role.
* Experience with and strong knowledge of AI/ML methodologies including Bagging/Boosting methods, Deep Learning, Generative AI, modern Natural Language Processing (NLP), Transformers, Diffusion models, and Generalized Additive models.
* Experience with Deep Learning and Generative AI technology stacks such as PyTorch, Tensorflow/Keras, LangChain, HuggingFace, etc.
* Motivated to stay up to date with the latest advancements in machine learning, and cloud technologies.
* Proficient in one or more scripting/programming languages such as Python, PySpark, Scala, etc.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., Azure DataBricks, Azure ML Studio) and big data technologies (e.g., PySpark, Hadoop).
* Familiarity with principles of Object Oriented Programming (OOP).
* Knowledge of machine learning explain\\-ability/interpretability algorithms.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills (position requires writing clean technical reports).
* Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast\\-paced, dynamic environment. Good time management and multitasking skills with minimal supervision.







***Preferred Qualifications***



* Ability to implement AI/ML algorithms from academic research papers is a plus.
* Experience with distributed computing and parallel processing using Spark.
* Knowledge of SQL and database systems.

Job Title: Specialiste Croissance et Generation de Leads avec IA / AI-Driven Growth & Lead Generation & Auto...
Job Description:
*English version will follow* 








 Specialiste Croissance et Generation de Leads avec IA
 







 Chez PEAK, nous valorisons une culture fondee sur la confiance et nous nous efforcons de maintenir un environnement collaboratif ainsi qu'une atmosphere conviviale entre nos employes. Nous offrons un cadre de travail dynamique avec des defis stimulants qui vous permettront d'atteindre votre plein potentiel. Nos valeurs sont l'humain, l'independance, l'innovation et l'integrite.
 







*Vous etes un expert en marketing pilote par IA, passionne par l'acquisition digitale, l'automatisation et la performance? Ce poste est fait pour vous!* 








 A propos du poste
 







 Nous recherchons un(e) Specialiste en croissance marketing, generation de leads et automatisation pilotee par l'IA pour concevoir et deployer des strategies marketing intelligentes et centrees sur les donnees.
 



 L'objectif est d'attirer, engager et convertir des conseillers financiers independants de haut niveau a grande echelle.
 



 Ce role exige une expertise en automatisation marketing via l'IA, analytique predictive et acquisition digitale, afin d'optimiser en continu les performances et d'accelerer le recrutement des conseillers.
 



 Le specialiste travaillera sous la gestion de la Directrice Communications et Marketing, en collaboration etroite avec l'equipe de Developpement des Affaires et la Specialiste en Marketing Digital, pour aligner les strategies d'acquisition avec les objectifs commerciaux.
 











 Ce que vous ferez
 







 1\\. Acquisition et generation de leads avec IA
 


* Concevoir et executer des campagnes d'acquisition multicanales pilotees par l'IA, integrant des modeles de machine learning pour affiner le ciblage et l'engagement.
* Exploiter l'analytique predictive et l'Intelligence artificielle (outils et autres) pour segmenter, identifier et hierarchiser les prospects a fort potentiel.
* Optimiser les chatbots conversationnels et l'automatisation des emails avec NLP pour accelerer la qualification des leads et reduire le cycle de conversion.
* Deployer des strategies ABM augmentees par l'IA pour une approche ultra\\-personnalisee des prospects.
* Utiliser des plateformes publicitaires IA (Google AI Ads, Meta, LinkedIn AI Targeting) pour maximiser les conversions et reduire le cout d'acquisition.
* Exploiter l'analytique predictive et l'Intelligence artificielle (outils et autres) pour segmenter, identifier et hierarchiser les prospects a fort potentiel.



 2\\. Automatisation \\& Optimisation CRM
 


* Collaborer avec la Specialiste du marketing digital et CRM Manager pour mettre en place une automatisation marketing basee sur l'IA (HubSpot ou autres outils necessaires), afin d'optimiser et de personnaliser les campagnes de recrutement de conseillers.
* Travailler en etroite collaboration pour integrer le scoring predictif des leads et le suivi comportemental au sein de HubSpot, en garantissant l'alignement avec les structures de donnees existantes et les workflows marketing.
* S'associer avec la Specialiste du marketing digital et CRM Manager pour developper des workflows adaptatifs bases sur l'IA, optimisant les sequences d'e\\-mails, les relances et le retargeting en fonction des signaux d'engagement en temps reel.
* Soutenir les initiatives marketing et de developpement d'affaires en deployant des outils d'aide a la vente alimentes par l'IA, facilitant la collaboration inter\\-equipes tout en s'alignant sur les strategies CRM et d'automatisation existantes.
* Developper des workflows IA adaptatifs, ajustant automatiquement les sequences d'emails, relances et reciblages selon les signaux d'engagement en temps reel.
* Mettre en place des outils d'aide a la vente pour ameliorer la collaboration entre marketing et developpement des affaires.



 3\\. Optimisation des performances et analytique de croissance
 


* Construire et affiner des tableaux de bord pour suivre les KPIs du recrutement : taux de conversion, engagement des prospects, prevision de valeur client.
* Exploiter des modeles de ''deep learning'' pour automatiser les tests A/B et optimiser les campagnes.
* Utiliser des ''heatmaps'' IA et analyses comportementales pour ameliorer l'experience utilisateur et maximiser les taux de conversion.
* Affiner les strategies marketing via des algorithmes d'apprentissage par renforcement, s'adaptant aux tendances historiques et aux comportements des prospects.



 4\\. Marque employeur et strategie de contenu pilotee par l'IA
 


* Creer du contenu dynamique genere par IA (pages d'atterrissages adaptatives, videos personnalisees, emails augmentes par NLP) pour maximiser l'engagement.
* Optimiser les campagnes LinkedIn et digitales via des recommandations IA en temps reel, renforcant le positionnement de la marque.
* Automatiser la production de contenus (articles, etudes de cas, temoignages) avec des outils de generation IA.
* Dynamiser les webinaires de recrutement avec des chatbots interactifs IA et analyses d'audience en temps reel.



 5\\. Collaboration et alignement strategiqueA
 


* Travailler avec l'equipe Developpement des affaires pour assurer l'alignement des strategies marketing IA avec les priorites de recrutement.
* Collaborer avec l'equipe de communication et de marketing pour integrer l'IA aux strategies existantes.
* Identifier et exploiter des partenariats strategiques IA pour accelerer l'acquisition de conseillers.







 Ce que nous recherchons
 


* Excellente maitrise du francais et de l'anglais, a l'oral comme a l'ecrit
* Experience averee en croissance marketing, generation de leads et automatisation, IA, idealement en services financiers, fintech ou B2B SaaS.
* Maitrise des outils d'automatisation marketing pilotes par IA (HubSpot, etc.).
* Expertise en modeles de machine learning appliques a l'analytique predictive, au scoring des leads et a la segmentation client.
* Connaissance approfondie des IA conversationnelles, NLP et integration chatbot.
* Solide experience en publicite digitale IA (Google Ads AI, LinkedIn Predictive Audiences, Meta AI).
* Competence en analyse de donnees et business intelligence (Google BigQuery, Looker, tableaux de bord IA).
* Capacite a automatiser et optimiser les tunnels d'acquisition via des strategies IA de personnalisation avancee.
* Excellentes competences analytiques et capacite a deployer des strategies a fort impact sous pression.
* Experience en marketing financier, gestion de patrimoine ou recrutement de conseillers.
* Connaissance des segmentations comportementales et recommandation IA.
* Experience en ABM assiste par IA pour des campagnes ultra\\-ciblees.
* Maitrise des outils de generation IA (ChatGPT, Jasper, Copy.ai) pour l'automatisation du contenu.







 Ce que nous offrons
 


* Poste permanent a temps plein (37\\.5h/semaine)
* Bureaux modernes avec vue, en plein cur du centre\\-ville de Montreal, facilement accessible en transports en commun
* Mode de travail hybride : 3 jours au bureau et 2 jours en teletravail
* 3 semaines de vacances et 5 journees maladies par annee
* Apres la periode de probation : Assurances collectives completes (maladie, dentaire, compte gestion sante, programme d'aide aux employes, telemedecine) prises en charge a 50% par l'employeur
* Apres la periode de probation : Programme de REER avec participation de l'employeur
* Prise en charge de 20% de la carte OPUS par l'employeur (equivalent a 2 mois gratuits par an)
* Implication dans la communaute et la cause corporative contre le cancer et autres associations
* Organisation frequente d'evenements par le comite social, bases sur l'evenementiel, la sante mentale et physique des employes et l'implication sociale et communautaire
* Encouragement au developpement personnel a travers la formation et l'evolution interne
* Remboursement de l'abonnement sportif a hauteur de 300$ par annee
* Acces gratuit a la salle de gym de l'immeuble







 A propos de PEAK
 



 Notre objectif est de faire une reelle difference dans la vie des Canadiens. Notre mission est d'ameliorer la qualite de vie des gens grace a une meilleure utilisation de leur argent.
 



 PEAK est le chef de file canadien du conseil entierement independant.
 



 Depuis sa fondation en 1992, PEAK n'a cesse d'elargir ses horizons et compte maintenant plus de 16 milliards de dollars d'actifs sous administration. Avec 1 500 conseillers, professionnels inscrits et employes a travers le Canada, PEAKa maintenu sa position de leader, mais n'a jamais perdu de vue ses valeurs et sa mission.
 







 Nous souhaitons remercier tous ceux et celles qui nous feront parvenir leur candidature, mais nous ne communiquerons qu'avec les candidats retenus pour une entrevue.
 







 \\*\\*\\*\\*\\*\\*
 







 AI\\-Driven Growth \\& Lead Generation \\& Automation Specialist
 







 At PEAK, we value a culture based on trust and strive to maintain a collaborative environment and a friendly atmosphere among our employees. We offer a dynamic working environment with stimulating challenges that will enable you to reach your full potential. Our values are people, independence, innovation and integrity.
 







*Are you an AI\\-driven marketing expert with a passion for digital acquisition, automation and performance? This position is for you!* 








 About the position
 







 We are looking for an AI\\-driven Growth Marketing, Lead Generation \\& Automation Specialist to design and implement intelligent, data\\-driven marketing systems that attract, engage, and convert top\\-tier independent financial advisors at scale. This role requires expertise in AI\\-powered automation, predictive analytics, and digital lead generation to drive continuous optimization and accelerate advisor acquisition.
 



 The specialist will report to the Marketing Director and collaborate closely with the Business Development team and the Digital marketing Specialist to ensure that AI\\-driven marketing solutions seamlessly support the firm's recruitment efforts.
 







 What you will do
 







 1\\. AI\\-Powered Lead Generation \\& Advisor Recruitment
 


* Design and execute multi\\-channel AI\\-driven lead generation campaigns, integrating machine learning models to optimize targeting and engagement.

* Optimize conversational AI chatbots and NLP\\-powered email automation to enhance lead qualification and accelerate recruitment.

* Build adaptive AI workflows that optimize email sequences, follow\\-ups, and retargeting based on real\\-time engagement signals.
* Deploy intelligent AI\\-powered sales enablement tools to enhance collaboration between marketing and business development teams.



 3\\. Performance Optimization \\& Growth Analytics

* Leverage deep learning models for A/B testing automation and continuous campaign optimization.
* Utilize AI\\-driven heatmaps and behavioral insights to enhance user experience and improve conversion funnel efficiency.
* Optimize campaigns with reinforcement learning algorithms, adapting marketing strategies based on historical performance and evolving advisor behaviors.



 4\\. AI\\-Powered Branding \\& Content Strategy
 


* Develop AI\\-generated dynamic content (adaptive landing pages, personalized video messaging, NLP\\-enhanced email sequences) to increase prospect engagement.
* Optimize LinkedIn and digital campaigns using predictive AI content recommendations to boost brand positioning and credibility.
* Implement generative AI tools to automate content creation, including blog articles, case studies, and thought leadership pieces.
* Enhance advisor recruitment webinars with AI\\-powered interactive Q\\&A bots and real\\-time audience analytics.



 5\\. Collaboration \\& Cross\\-Team Alignment
 


* Work closely with Business Development to align AI\\-driven marketing initiatives with sales priorities and advisor recruitment goals.
* Partner with the Digital Marketing \\& Communications teams to integrate AI capabilities into existing marketing strategies.
* Identify and leverage strategic AI partnerships to enhance advisor acquisition efforts.



 What we are looking for
 


* Excellent command of spoken and written French and English.
* Proven track record in AI\\-powered growth marketing, automation, and lead generation, ideally in financial services, fintech, or B2B SaaS.
* Expertise in AI\\-driven marketing automation tools (HubSpot).
* Experience with machine learning models for predictive analytics, lead scoring, and customer segmentation.
* Deep understanding of conversational AI, NLP automation, and chatbot integration.
* Strong performance marketing skills, including AI\\-optimized advertising (Google Ads AI, LinkedIn Predictive Audiences, Meta).
* Proficiency in data analytics and business intelligence tools (Google BigQuery, Looker, AI\\-powered analytics dashboards).

 Montreal, QC**
